description: An island in the New World split between fire and ice, formerly used by the World Government for scientific experiments.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Group Travels Across Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Zoro, Robin, and Usopp ride Brownbeard across the harsh Punk Hazard landscape toward the research facility.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the Straw Hats adapting to the extreme environment of Punk Hazard.

keyEvents.title: Body-Swapped Straw Hats Escape with Children
keyEvents.description: The body-swapped Straw Hats attempt to flee across Punk Hazard with kidnapped children.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the dangers and challenges of navigating Punk Hazard's environment.

name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

description: A large research laboratory on Punk Hazard where Caesar Clown conducts his experiments.

keyEvents.title: Law vs. Smoker Battle at Facility Entrance
keyEvents.description: Law and Smoker engage in combat at the entrance to the research facility.
keyEvents.significance: The facility entrance becomes the battlefield for a major confrontation between Law and the Marines.

keyEvents.title: Smoker's Defeat at the Facility
keyEvents.description: Smoker collapses in defeat after Law extracts his heart at the facility entrance.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the facility as a place where Law demonstrates his dominance.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Arrives at the Facility
keyEvents.description: Luffy reaches the research facility and reunites with Law.
keyEvents.significance: The facility becomes the convergence point for Luffy and Law's meeting.
